//picks theorem: 2A = 2*i + b -2;
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define	pii pair<int,int>
#define	vi vector<int>
#define	mp make_pair
#define	pb push_back
#define X first
#define Y second
#define	ill int long long
#define INF 1000000000

ill area(pii p1, pii p2, pii p3){
	ill ans;
	ans = (ill)p1.X*(p2.Y-p3.Y) + (ill)p2.X*(p3.Y-p1.Y) + (ill)p3.X*(p1.Y-p2.Y);
	if(ans < 0) ans *= -1;
	return ans;
}

int gcd(int a, int b){
	if(b == 0) return a;
	return gcd(b, a%b);
}

int online(pii p1, pii p2){
	int a,b;
	a = abs(p1.X-p2.X);
	b = abs(p1.Y-p2.Y);
	if(a < b) a = b + a - (b = a);
	return gcd(a,b);
}

void solve(){
	ill ans;
	int a,b;
	pii p[4];
	for(int i=0;i<4;i++){
		cin>>a>>b;
		p[i].X = a; p[i].Y = b;
	}
	ans = min(area(p[0],p[1],p[2]) + area(p[0],p[2],p[3]),area(p[1],p[2],p[3]) + area(p[0],p[1],p[3]));
	for(int i=0;i<4;i++){
		ans += online(p[i],p[(i+1)%4]);
	}
	ans += 2;
	cout<<ans/2<<endl;
	return;
}

int main(){
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	for(int i=0;i<t;i++){
		printf("Case %d: ",i+1);
		solve();
	}
	return 0;
}
